name: Misfortune (NaV)
description:
Based on this work.

Story:

Long ago, there once was a building said to bring great luck to those who reached the top.

However, those who failed the trials where said to have great misfortune fall upon them.

A boy was adventuring the world, searching for forgotten places. This day, he stumbled upon an old building in the desert. Not fearing a great adventure, he entered to discover what was at the top.
